document.full_text: neil patrick harris, a star of "how i met your mother," who hosted the 2009 tony awards, the 2009 emmy awards and, for some reason, the 2010 spike video game awards, will return as tonys host next month.
document.title: neil patrick harris will return as tony awards host
lines_and_colors: neil patrick harris, a star of "how i met your mother," who hosted the 2009 tony awards, the 2009 emmy awards and, for some reason, the 2010 spike video game awards, will return as tonys host next month.
